mapper.sql: retail_code, member_id, user_id, remark, item_id, storage_id, item_number, money, trade_time,account_id
mapper.select:
select retail_order.item_number itemNumber,retail_order.money,retail_order.trade_time tradeTime,retail_order.remark,retail_order.retail_code retailCode, member.memberNumber, usr.name userName, item.name itemName,item.item_code itemCode,item.price, account.code accountCode,account.bank_name bankName, storage.name storageName from retail_order inner join member on member.id = retail_order.member_id inner join `User` usr on usr.id = retail_order.user_id inner join item on item.id = retail_order.item_id inner join storage on storage.id = retail_order.storage_id inner join account on account.id = retail_order.account_id where 1=1
and retail_order.trade_time > #{start}
and retail_order.trade_time < #{end}
and storage.name like concat('%',#{storagename},'%')
and item.name like concat('%',#{itemname},'%')
and account.bank_name like concat('%',#{bankname},'%')
and usr.name like concat('%',#{username},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into retail_order (member_id, user_id, remark, item_id, storage_id, item_number, money, trade_time,account_id) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into retail_order
member_id,
user_id,
remark,
item_id,
storage_id,
item_number,
money,
trade_time,
#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{storageId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{itemNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{money,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update retail_order
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
storage_id = #{storageId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
item_number = #{itemNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
money = #{money,jdbcType=FLOAT},
trade_time = #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where retail_code = #{retailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update retail_order set member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storage_id = #{storageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_number = #{itemNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=FLOAT}, trade_time = #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where retail_code = #{retailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
